id.description: Unique identifier for this node. Required for traversal targets.

layout.description: Spatial arrangement strategy for this node's content blocks.

transition.description: Animation effect when entering this node.

speaker-notes.description:
Hidden notes visible only to the presenter, not the audience.
Presenter notes, GM tips, teaching hints.

traversal.description: Traversal overrides for leaving this node.

content.description: The content blocks displayed at this node.
